TopicTitle: How to turn off making kerbal dollars

Articles.Content:
Hello.

Sorry if this is in the wrong thread area.

Okay... having been playing the game for a while and the new patch auto updates.

I now have Kerbill$$ to earn.

None of the missions I was in the middle of doing can launch, since I have no money.

Is there a way to turn off this feature?

Thanks and much cheers.

Since I answered your other thread, I'll be locking this one.

Cheers,

~Claw
